index.slogan:
Your Ultimate

Manager of Images in S3 Buckets
index.description: Upload, view and delete images in your S3 bucket with ease
index.compatibility: Also works with lots of S3-compatible services

keyTemplate.title: Key template
keyTemplate.description: Template for the S3 key. Learn more at <more>docs</more>, including the available placeholders.
keyTemplate.deprecatedPlaceholderWarning: placeholder {placeholder} has been deprecated, use {instead} instead
keyTemplate.defaultKeyTemplateDesc: The default template used when uploading files. You can override this template when performing uploads.

imageCompress.title: Image convertion and compression
imageCompress.description: Convert or compress your image before uploading them.
imageCompress.enableDesc: If turned off, images will be uploaded to S3 as is.
imageCompress.qualityDesc: Quality for the compressed image, integer from 1 to 100.

s3Settings.title: S3
s3Settings.pathStyleDesc: Force using the deprecated <more>path style API</more>.
s3Settings.publicUrlDesc: The access url for the public bucket. <mono>public-url/object-path</mono> should be able to access the object in bucket. Learn more at <more>docs</more>.

messages.connectionFailed: Unable to connect to your S3 bucket. Please check:
messages.settingsCorrect: Your S3 settings are correct and working!
messages.corsPermissionsNeeded: You just need to add CORS permissions for these methods:

checklist.bucketValid: Bucket name and region are valid
checklist.corsConfigured: CORS is configured for your origin

errors.sameNameError: New name is the same as the old name
errors.loadFailed: Failed to load profile. Please try again.
errors.cannotDeleteCurrent: Cannot delete the currently active profile.
errors.invalidFormat: Invalid profile format. Missing name or data.
errors.parseFailed: Failed to parse profile JSON. Please check the format.

s3Invalid.s3ConfigDesc: S3 settings are not valid or not configured, please check in the settings page.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.autoRefreshDesc: Refresh the gallery every time it loads. If enabled, there will be more List requests, which may slightly increase S3 costs.

filter.directoryTree: Find images like in a directory tree.
filter.clickToOpenCalendar: Click the button to open the calendar and select a date range.

sort.sortActiveMessage: Search is active, sort options are disabled. Photos will be sorted by search match.
sort.sortInactiveMessage: Choose how to sort the photos.
sort.name: Name (Path)
sort.sortOrderDesc: Show results in ascending or descending order.
